transport.question: I go beep beep! I take you places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I have wheels.
🚦 You see me on the road.
👪 Mommy and Daddy drive me.

transport.question: I float on the water. I can be big or small. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move.
⚓️ I can carry people or things.
🐳 Sometimes you see whales near me.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal me. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ You can ride me outside.
👧 You sit on a seat to ride me.
🔔 I sometimes have a bell.

transport.question: I fly in the sky. I have wings and an engine. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I can take you very far away.
💺 You sit inside with a seatbelt.
✈️ I go to the airport.

transport.question: I go choo-choo! I run on tracks. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I travel a long way on metal rails.
🚂 Many people can ride inside me.
🚝 You can take me to a different city.

transport.question: I'm big and yellow and take kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 I stop to let children get on and off.
👦 I have lots of seats.
🛑 I have flashing lights.

transport.question: I help people who are hurt and have a siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I go very fast.
🩺 I take people to the hospital.
🚨 My siren makes a loud noise.

transport.question: I help firefighters put out fires. I have a hose. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I spray water.
🚒 I am usually red.
👨‍🚒 Firefighters ride in me.

transport.question: I dig in the ground. I have a big scoop. What am I?

hints.text: 🚧 You see me at construction sites.
🚜 I am very strong.
🪨 I can move dirt and rocks.

transport.question: I go beep! beep! I'm small and yellow, and can park anywhere. What am I?

hints.text: 🛵 I can weave through traffic.
👤 One person can ride me easily.
🪖 You wear a helmet when you ride me.
🥛 I give you milk to drink!
🌱 I like to eat grass in the field.
⚫ I have black and white spots.

animal.question: I wag my tail. Who am I?

hints.text: 🍖 I love to eat bones.
🐾 I like to go for walks with you!
🏠 I live in a kennel.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🥛 I drink milk from a bowl.
🐈 I like to purr when you pet me.

animal.question: I say 'Quack!' and swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have a flat beak.
🌾 I like to eat seeds.
🐣 Baby versions of me are called ducklings.

animal.question: I have a long trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love peanuts!
🐘 I am big and grey.
💦 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat carrots.
🐇 I have a fluffy tail.
🌱 I like to hop in the grass.

animal.question: I have a big mane and roar loudly. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I am the king of the jungle.
🥩 I like to eat meat.
☀️ My mane looks like the sun.

animal.question: I climb trees and eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I like to swing from branch to branch.
🌴 I live in the jungle.
🙊 I make silly sounds.

animal.question: I have stripes and say 'Neigh!'. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 People can ride on my back.
🌾 I like to eat hay.
🦓 I have black and white stripes all over my body.

animal.question: I waddle and live in a cold place. What am I?

hints.text: 🐧 I like to eat fish.
🧊 I live near the South Pole.
⚫ I am black and white.
